lines.gurmukhi: jYsy nrpiq bhu bnqw ibvwh krY; jw kY jnmq suq vwhI igRih rwj hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as a king marries many young maids, but she who produces him a son has the kingdom in her home.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs pRkwr rwjw bhuq swrIAwˆ qIvIAwˆ nwl ivAwh krOˆdw hY, pr ijs dy Gr pihl pRQmy puqR jMm pvy rwj Bwg BI Esy dy hI Gr Aw jwXw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy diD miD chUM Er mY bohQ clY; joeI pwr phucY pUrn sb kwj hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as ships sail in the ocean from all directions, but the ship that reaches its destination safely and on time, its travellers are benefited the most.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ audiD smuMdR ivc cwroˆ pwsIˆ hI jhwj cldy iPrdy hn, pr ijhVw koeI pwr puj pvy Esy dy XwqRUAwˆ dy hI sB kwrj rws ho jwˆdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Kwin Knq AnMq Knvwrw KojI; hIrw hwiQ cVY jw kY qw kY bwju bwj hY [

Unknown.translation: As the miners dig the mines and one who is able to dig out or locate a diamond indulges in merry-making and festivities.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs qrHwˆ Kwxwˆ vwly AnMq KojI Kwxwˆ nUM pu`tdy iPrdy hn, pRMqU ijs dy h`Q hIrw Awx cVHy Bwv ijs iksy nUM hIrw lB pYˆdw hY, Es dy Gr bwjy v`j pYˆdy hn, AwnMd mMgl iKV AOˆdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurisK nvqn Aau purwqnwid; kw pir ktwiC ikRpw qw kY Cib Cwj hY [371[

Unknown.translation: So are many old and new Sikhs of the True Guru. But those who are blessed with His clemency and look of grace, become noble, beautiful, wise and respectable through meditation of Naam. (371)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqsI pRkwr hI gurU mhwrwj dy nivAwˆ Aqy purwixAwˆ is`Kwˆ ivcoˆ ijnHwˆ aupr siqgurU ikRpw ktwKÎ kr dyx bKSS vw brkq BrI ingHw nwl q`k lYx, Esy dI hI Cib suMdRqw Cwj hY suhOxI ho ipAw krdI hY Bwv Esy dI rhq bhq qQw is`KI Dwrxw sB idAwˆ mnwˆ nUM mohx hwrI bx jwXw krdI hY ]371]
